divs: Sighting DetailsAround the hours of 12:00 am and 1:00 am I was drive down Alma School and Pecos when I saw a round Brightly lite object in the sky the object was traveling fairly slow and steady it began moving in weird directions after i pointed to the object it seemed to gather speed and was gone within seconds of me pointing at it after a while i saw it again only this time it was lite green and seemed to rush away after a few seconds.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There were no other sightings in Chandler on or around August 25th 2008
